caption.center: TOMMY TANNER, APPELLANT, v. THE STATE OF FLORIDA, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal from the Circuit Court of Dade County, Allen Kornblum and Ralph N. Person, Judges.
opinion.attorneys:
Bennett H. Brummer, Public Defender, Samek Besser and Lawrence E. Besser, Sp. Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Robert A. Butterworth, Atty. Gen. and Charles M. Fahlbusch, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before BARKDULL, GERSTEN and GODERICH, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Cochran v. State, 547 So.2d 928 (Fla. 1989); Statev. Murray, 443 So.2d 955 (Fla. 1984); Gentry v. State, 437 So.2d 1097 (Fla. 1983); Reimel v. State, 532 So.2d 16 (Fla. 5th DCA 1988), review denied, 542 So.2d 989 (Fla. 1989); Carpenterv. State, 474 So.2d 1237 (Fla. 5th DCA 1985); Houston v.State, 394 So.2d 557 (Fla. 3d DCA 1981); Horne v. State, 116 So.2d 654 (Fla. 2d DCA 1959).
